content: निष्कः --कं {@--1@} A golden coin (of different values, but generally taken to be equal to one {%Karṣa%} or Suvarṇa of 16 Māṣas). {@--2@} A weight of gold equal to 108 or 150 Suvarṇas <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--3@} A golden ornament for the neck or the breast; <ls>Ku. 2. 49.</ls> {@--4@} Gold in general. {@--5@} A golden vessel. --ष्कः A Cāṇḍāla.
